LG TV kaufen & Sound erleben!
Ein farbenfroher, quadratischer Tunnel, der nach hinten hin immer schmaler wird, dargestellt auf einem LG Fernseher.

In einem violett getönten, dunklen Raum wird eine Nahaufnahme des Gesichts eines Mannes auf einem geteiltem Bildschirm gezeigt. Links wird „SDR“ angezeigt und das Bild ist unscharf. Rechts wird „HDR10 Pro“ angezeigt und das Bild ist klar und scharf.
LG Fernseher und LG Soundbar in einem modernen Wohnraum bei Nacht. Das Bild des Polarlichts wird auf dem Bildschirm mit der idealen Helligkeitsstufe angezeigt.
LG Fernseher und LG Soundbar in einem modernen Wohnraum bei Tag. Das Bild des Polarlichts wird auf dem Bildschirm mit der idealen Helligkeitsstufe angezeigt.
Ein LG TV zeigt Musikaufführungen. Um die Mikrofone und Instrumente herum sind helle Kreisgrafiken zu sehen.
LG Fernseher mit Klangblasen und Wellen, die vom Bildschirm ausgehen und den Raum füllen.
Ein Mann fährt auf einem Motorrad auf einer unbefestigten Straße mit hellen Kreisgrafiken um das Motorrad herum.
Ein LG TV zeigt Musikaufführungen. Um die Mikrofone und Instrumente herum sind helle Kreisgrafiken zu sehen.
LG Fernseher mit Klangblasen und Wellen, die vom Bildschirm ausgehen und den Raum füllen.
Ein Bild des Logos des webOS Re:New Program vor einem schwarzen Hintergrund mit einer blauen und violetten kreisförmigen Kugel am unteren Rand.

Startbildschirm von webOS 24 mit den Kategorien Heimbüro, Spiel, Musik, Heimzentrale und Sport. Im unteren Teil des Bildschirms werden unter „Ihre Top-Empfehlungen“ personalisierte Empfehlungen angezeigt.
Auf einem Ultra Big LG Fernseher, der an der braunen Wand eines Wohnzimmers montiert ist, umgeben von cremefarbenen modularen Möbeln, wird ein Nashorn in einer Safari-Umgebung gezeigt.
Die obere linke Ecke eines LG Fernsehers, auf der ein mehrfarbiges Kunstwerk zu sehen ist. Der Fernseher ist mit kaum sichtbarem Abstand an der Wand montiert.
Ein Mann in einem dunklen Schnittstudio, der auf einen LG Fernseher schaut, auf dem ein Sonnenuntergang zu sehen ist. Rechts unten auf dem Bild befindet sich ein FILMMAKER-Mode-Logo.
Eine Familie sitzt auf dem Boden eines schwach beleuchteten Wohnzimmers an einem kleinen Tisch und blickt auf einen LG Fernseher an der Wand, der die Erde aus dem Weltraum zeigt.
Ein Auto-Rennspiel mit der Aufschrift „WIN!“ auf der Tafel an der Ziellinie, während der Spieler den Joystick festhält. Die ALLM-, eARC- und HGiG-Logos sind an der unteren linken Ecke platziert.
Eine FPS-Spielszene mit dem Game Dashboard, das während des Spiels über dem Bildschirm erscheint. Eine dunkle, winterliche Szene mit dem Game-Optimizer-Menü, das über dem Spiel erscheint.
Ein Boosteroid-Startbildschirm mit der Anzeige „Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince“. Ein GeForce-NOW-Startbildschirm mit fünf verschiedenen Spiel-Miniaturansichten auf der rechten Seite.

featured.headline: A journey to discover what sounds are really made
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The LG TONE FREE T90Q gives sensations that can be described only by having them on.

In fact, I'm actually wearing them at this moment to best describe the unique new and familiar feelings that these earbuds can gift 
As soon as i wore one of the buds I felt the ANC (Active Noise Canceling) kicking in adapting itself according to how it fits in my ears and recognizing what I need to hear or not.

The sound quality is one of its kind:
• thanks for the special touch of Meridian
• Graphene material: thin, strong and lightweight to deliver clean clear sound 
• And Dolby Atmos that makes it feel like everything that I'm hearing it's happening all around me, mind blowing!

Another perk that I'm really impressed of is the VPU (Voice Pickup Unit) that separates my voice from the ambient sounds to be heard clearly during a call.

I can switch in between 3 main modes:

Whispering Mode: I just need to take one of the earbuds and whisper in the microphone to have more private conversation with family, close friends or just because I need to tell a little secret 

Listening Mode: to be able to hear what's going on around me, especially when I'm on the run for work, gym, groceries or simply doing home cleaning to be able to hear my wife if she needs anything

Conversation Mode: allows me to hear clearly anyone that is speaking without the need of removing the earbuds

Oh did I forget to say that these are also waterproof?!

Perfect for the weather where I live, I can fight the rain while listening to my music and reach my destination triumphant

I'm not worried about sharing the earbuds with others thanks to the UV Nano, located in the earbuds case, that kills 99.9% of bacteria.

And as a passionate gamer I'm so glad that I can connect the earbuds to my PS5 and up to other 5 different devices like handheld consoles, laptops, TV and desktops without sacrificing nothing in sound quality.

The FREE-T90Q it's really in a class of its own!
featured.author: Julio AJ

featured.headline: Ergonomic Masterpiece & All Round Behemoth
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Normally I do not write reviews but THE PRODUCTS has excelled my expectations, yes plural because I started my high-fidelity sonic adventure with possession of LG TONE free UFP9.  Literally sound hi-fi possessed me comfortably again when I put on my new upgraded LG TONE free T90Q.
I tried many before & I own a few hi-ends brands earbuds but there was always this uncomfortable problem with fit as I have very small ears and wearing it for longer was unbearable until finding lg tone free. I do take a nap with them and forget about foreign objects in ear canals. T90Q is a massive improvement over UFP9 but do not understand me wrong UFP9 is still an excellent product.
LG TONE free T90Q perfectly combines ergonomy with highest achievable bluetooth sound quality through the newest Bluetooth 5.3 version.
I am a cross platform user and due to implementing multi-point & multi-pairing feature accompanied with fantastic option rich app I can enjoy the full potential of T90Q in Linux, Windows, IOS, Android and all the analog devices via unique for earbuds Plug & Wireless feature plus the case works like BT transmitter for PC when connected to usb.
Meridian Sound guys really did a piece of good work for my taste of sound.
Dolby Atmos virtual sound convinced me to dump my big chunky headphones to watch the movies and Dolby Atmos virtual headtracking makes me feel like I am in a concert when watching music videos.
Charging case is pocket friendly and can take it everywhere, furthermore the case has another unique feature it is UV lights which helps to keep ear hygiene by disinfecting microbes and preventing inflammation of the ear.
Sport - ear secure fit tested while running, sits securely in ear and never loose.
Battery life is amazing, it is impossible to run out of juice when correctly used.
Noise cancelling improved over predecessor, ambient mode very handy.
Interesting Tone Free Lab feature including whispering mode, game mode and UVnano Always-on.
Very clear voice during video conferences and calls thanks to 3 microphones, the earbuds tested in various scenarios.
Genuinely I do recommend LG TONE free T90Q to everybody. It is an all round behemoth, I never used such a broad-spectrum piece of hi-tech. Honestly, after using it for some time I am very happy with LGs newest, mature and complete product. 
Wow! The LG team did a great job !!!!
featured.author: Pavv

featured.headline: Plane live saver
featured.body:
A Life Saver in the plane. 
I have my new LG earbud not for long but already proved their value. I was traveling back from holidays with a plane full of screaming babies and plane itself very laud. I switch on my new noise cancelation feature and then like a magic - nice silence, almost noting except the music. I was so amazed that decided to write the review. Well done LG, I really like my new toy.
featured.author: Iwona

featured.headline: Comfort with phenomenal sound
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Have had them a few days but in my opinion they are fantastic.
Really easy to use.
Lightweight.
The sound is clear and true no screeching like with some headphones I've used.
Easy to set up.
Clear understandable instructions so even if your not techy they will be easy for you.
Great app you can download for Android or apple QR code on box.
They connect really easily via Bluetooth.
Comes with all the wires for charging plus you can use a dock if you've one.
Extra buds so you for the ones comfy for you.
Recyclable packaging.
Blue light kills bacteria whilst they charge.
Really quick charge.
Connects to variety of devices.
Snapdragon sound. Dolby Atmos.
You can set up find my buds if you tend to loose things lol. 
I've been using them for music and podcasts plus the odd call and have had no trouble. They haven't made my ears uncomfortable unlike conventional earphones.
Magnets keep them in place in the case.
featured.author: TraceyR

featured.headline: A Well Rounded Experience
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've never really been a fan of wireless earphones because of how uncomfortable they feel after a short period of time. However, the Tone Free UT90Q's are incredible! The have a well round, 3D sound expierence offering total comfort throughout the day. Moreover, the noise-cancelling of the earbuds is unbeatable, they are for all situations. The battery life has been improved upon as well which gives you even longer to enjoy your media.

I'd barely notice them in my ears, there was no discomfort, even when using the when exercising. Outstanding earbuds! Would highly recommend!
featured.author: Mills012

featured.headline: Blown away
featured.body: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was given this product in exchange for my honest review. I am blown away by how great this tv is. The picture and sound quality is amazing for such a large screen. It was super easy to set up and navigate all of the settings. I was really impressed by the custom image settings. It’s very customizable to your specific preferences. The versatility of this tv is great. Switching from a movie to a football game and then to a video game all with different picture settings is so convenient and really gives the watcher the best experience. It has a very user friendly home-screen that can easily be customized to your specific needs. The remote is very straightforward and easy to use! I absolutely love this tv and all of its features!
featured.author: Mikayla M

featured.headline: Great quality earbuds and sound
featured.body: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These earbuds are great, the quality is superb and the sound they produce is the best. I use them mostly for music and they do not disappoint in any way. I love the little black case, it is so cute and tiny, it fits in my pocket or little handbag with no problem.  I like the black colour, it is very neutral but looks so good. They are pricey but you get what you pay for in this case. I think they will last me a long time so they are worth the price. Noise cancelling works perfectly, does not block out everything but muffles it so its just me and my music. Bottom line - they are great and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a good quality earbuds.
featured.author: dexter666

featured.headline: Simply the best - Amazing sound !
featured.body:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] When 5 stars are simply not enough. 
Over the years I’ve tried many ear buds but these are on another level from the build to the fit to the most amazing sound quality. What intrigued me was that it’s the first to feature Dolby Atmos. LG did not let me down in fact exceeded my expectations. 
The casing is rugged and neat and compact, the connection to iPad and iPhone was so easy  using the app. The app is simple to use and adjust to preset sounds or you can set up your own settings. 
The fit was perfect, I have small ear canals and have lost ear buds before,, this was perfect .
The sound quality just blew me away with its deep base to immersive depth of sound.
LG have bought an amazing piece of kit to the consumer. 
Happy to recommend this awesome product.
featured.author: Jollyfoodandtravels

metadata.title: 98 Zoll 4K LG UHD Smart UT91 | LG DE
metadata.description: Entdecke den LG UHD Fernseher UT91 mit HDR10 Pro und α5 Gen7 4K AI-Prozessor , mit webOS 24, einfacher Soundbar-Steuerung über die WOW-Oberfläche und in einem eleganten, superschlanken Design.
metadata.ogTitle: 98 Zoll 4K LG UHD Smart TV UT91 - 98UT91006LA.AEEQ | LG DE

I've been using them for music and podcasts plus the odd call and have had no trouble. They haven't made my ears uncomfortable unlike conventional earphones.
Magnets keep them in place in the case.

review.headline: A Well Rounded Experience
review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've never really been a fan of wireless earphones because of how uncomfortable they feel after a short period of time. However, the Tone Free UT90Q's are incredible! The have a well round, 3D sound expierence offering total comfort throughout the day. Moreover, the noise-cancelling of the earbuds is unbeatable, they are for all situations. The battery life has been improved upon as well which gives you even longer to enjoy your media.

I'd barely notice them in my ears, there was no discomfort, even when using the when exercising. Outstanding earbuds! Would highly recommend!

review.headline: Blown away
review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was given this product in exchange for my honest review. I am blown away by how great this tv is. The picture and sound quality is amazing for such a large screen. It was super easy to set up and navigate all of the settings. I was really impressed by the custom image settings. It’s very customizable to your specific preferences. The versatility of this tv is great. Switching from a movie to a football game and then to a video game all with different picture settings is so convenient and really gives the watcher the best experience. It has a very user friendly home-screen that can easily be customized to your specific needs. The remote is very straightforward and easy to use! I absolutely love this tv and all of its features!

review.headline: Great quality earbuds and sound
review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These earbuds are great, the quality is superb and the sound they produce is the best. I use them mostly for music and they do not disappoint in any way. I love the little black case, it is so cute and tiny, it fits in my pocket or little handbag with no problem.  I like the black colour, it is very neutral but looks so good. They are pricey but you get what you pay for in this case. I think they will last me a long time so they are worth the price. Noise cancelling works perfectly, does not block out everything but muffles it so its just me and my music. Bottom line - they are great and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a good quality earbuds.

review.headline: Simply the best - Amazing sound !
review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] When 5 stars are simply not enough. 
Over the years I’ve tried many ear buds but these are on another level from the build to the fit to the most amazing sound quality. What intrigued me was that it’s the first to feature Dolby Atmos. LG did not let me down in fact exceeded my expectations. 
The casing is rugged and neat and compact, the connection to iPad and iPhone was so easy  using the app. The app is simple to use and adjust to preset sounds or you can set up your own settings. 
The fit was perfect, I have small ear canals and have lost ear buds before,, this was perfect .
The sound quality just blew me away with its deep base to immersive depth of sound.
LG have bought an amazing piece of kit to the consumer. 
Happy to recommend this awesome product.

jsonLd.name: 98 Zoll 4K LG UHD Smart TV UT91
jsonLd.description: Entdecken Sie LG 98UT91006LA.AEEQ. Für Bilder, Bewertungen und technische Daten zu LG klicken 98 Zoll 4K LG UHD Smart TV UT91.
